entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
